title: 1.15的木牌传送
author: cf2b
txt_content: 1.13的木牌传送指令data merge block <x1> <y1> <z1> {Text1:"{\"text\":\"要显示的字\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/tp <x2> <y2> <z2>\"}}"}  在1.15不能用了，问一下如何修改

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
cf2b 发表于 2020-3-16 19:09
还是不行，跟之前一样，指令是用出来了，但是服务器右键牌子还是显示unknown commend，是我服务器插件的 ...
哦，刚才没注意，这样

/minecraft:data merge block -53 4 -101 {Text1:'{"text":"要显示的字","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/minecraft:tp ~ ~ ~"}}'}

replies.author: cf2b
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-16 18:57
/data merge block -53 4 -101 {Text1:'{"text":"要显示的字","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","valu ...
我单机这个指令能用了，但是服务器里试了之后右键牌子说是未知指令，有办法解决吗

replies.author: xmdhs
cf2b
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-16 19:03
/minecraft:data merge block -53 4 -101 {Text1:'{"text":"要显示的字","clickEvent":{"action":"run_co ...
还是不行，跟之前一样，指令是用出来了，但是服务器右键牌子还是显示unknown commend，是我服务器插件的问题吗

replies.author: cf2b
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-16 19:11
哦，刚才没注意，这样

/minecraft:data merge block -53 4 -101 {Text1:'{"text":"要显示的字","clickEv ...
能用了，多谢大佬

replies.author: 洞穴夜莺
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-16 19:03
/minecraft:data merge block -53 4 -101 {Text1:'{"text":"要显示的字","clickEvent":{"action":"run_co ...
为啥指令要写命名空间？
